pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.menu

Class InlineMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.menu.InlineMenu

  • public class InlineMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    An inline keyboard represented like a Menu.
    Author:
    Mazen Kotb
    See Also:
    builder(TelegramBot), builder(TelegramBot, Chat)

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static InlineMenuBuilder builder(TelegramBot bot)
        Create a new inline menu builder
        Parameters:
        bot - The bot that will be used to send the message for this inline menu
        Returns:
        new inline menu builder

      • builder

        public static InlineMenuBuilder builder(TelegramBot bot,
                                        Chat forWhom)
        Creates new builder, initializes with the required Chat field
        Parameters:
        bot - The bot that will be used to send the message for this inline menu
        forWhom - The chat the inline menu will be sent to
        Returns:
        new inline menu builder initialized with the forWhom field

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the inline menu, applies it's keyboard to the menu. Registers itself as the menu used by the message
        See Also:
        apply(), InlineMenuRegistry.register(InlineMenu)

      • unregister

        public void unregister()
        Disables listener of the menu. Removes from internal cache.
        See Also:
        InlineMenuRegistry.unregister(InlineMenu)

      • rowAt

        public InlineMenuRow rowAt(int index)
        Returns row of specified index
        Parameters:
        index - Index to get the row at
        Returns:
        row
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if provided out of bounds index

      • toKeyboard

        public InlineKeyboardMarkup toKeyboard()
        Converts rows to the inline keyboard markup used by the Telegram API
        Returns:
        keyboard markup

      • handle

        public boolean handle(CallbackQuery query,
                      int row,
                      int button)
        Handle an inline query sent. Caller dependent, throws exception if called from a class which doesn't implement InlineMenuRegistry
        Returns:
        Whether the menu handled the request, if not it was due to a user predicate or invalid row or invalid button
        See Also:
        InlineMenuRegistry, InlineMenuRow.handle(CallbackQuery, int)

      • apply

        public void apply()
        Apply any updates to the message

      • setMessageText

        public void setMessageText(SendableTextMessage.SendableTextMessageBuilder messageBuilder)
        Set the text of the current message, updates keyboard
        Parameters:
        messageBuilder - New Message text
        See Also:
        apply()

      • setInternalId

        public void setInternalId(int newId)
        Set the new internal id. Caller dependent, throws exception if called from a class which doesn't implement InlineMenuRegistry
        Parameters:
        newId - Internal id
        See Also:
        InlineMenuRegistry
